shows.title: Mouses
shows.desc: Conjuring the raw energy of the Libertines and the sass of the Arctic Monkeys, Mouses are a fuzzed-out, lo-fi garage-punk duo renowned for their energetic live performances. Radio 1’s Huw Stephens recently made them his Tip of the Week. Tireless supporters of individuality and gender fluidity, they hold their annual DIY safe-space festival - Mousetival - in their North-East homeland.

shows.title: The Daily Mirror
shows.desc: Featuring the festival’s smartest thinkers, artists and activists, including you! Cole Moreton helps us look beyond the headlines to try and work out what’s really going on in the world. Come prepared to listen, laugh and have your say.
